parameter.label: Error Handling
parameter.tooltip: Determine what to return if an error is encountered.

parameter.label: From (Email Address)
parameter.tooltip: The email address of the simulated sender.

parameter.label: To (Email Address)
parameter.tooltip: The email address of the intended recipient.

parameter.label: Bcc (Email Address)
parameter.tooltip: The email address of the intended recipient.

parameter.label: HTML Body
parameter.tooltip: HTML representing the body of a rich email.

parameters.parameter:
Hi <%= @user['Display Name'] %>,

We're excited to explore the intricacies of Kinetic Data's front-end development with you. Here's a link to your environment for use during the training.

End User Portal: <%= @space_attributes['Web Server Url'] %>
Admin Portal: <%= @space_attributes['Web Server Url'] %>/app

Your username is: <%= @user['Email'] %>
Your password is: <%= @user['Email'] %>2024

Please change the password after you verify you are able to access the space. We'll keep this environment around for 2 weeks after the training event. If you'd like to have it for longer, just let us know!

Happy Learning!

Kinetic Data

parameter.label: Alternate (text) Body
parameter.tooltip: A plaintext message that will be displayed if the recipient can't display multipart HTML emails.
